data.text: @rithunath_g This is actually terrible. Considering exams much more important than their own health. I don't understand how the authorities are not able to under the plight of the students....🙂
@rithunath_g Is this the new normal now? Where is this Pandemic leading our education & administration?

@rithunath_g Doesn't our life and our health matter...My suggestion is that we boycott this exam... It is a bad experience from the University...Not making exams online... They could have atleast taken some precautions... Instead everyone have exam in same class...Helping corona to spread.

@rithunath_g Its a very sad thing...This teachers takes online class saying they are under quarantine...But when the coin is turned(when we are in querentine)...the don't give a shit ...We should protest against this....this is very barberic nature of colleges...

@SalihYoosaf Why are people nit aware about this all we asked were to conduct exams in a convenient way for both the students. Then why are they limiting all this? Also there are other universities who are still following online classes considering the safety of students!
@rithunath_g you had better seek opinion about legal support

@rithunath_g Case is we can't blame any particular teachers on this reason. It's because of the instructions they got from higher office and University. Even students don't care about this bad situation of their friends.
